requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX9.0c compatible
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Both KB and controllers are supported (max one player on KB).
Windows XP or Windows Vista, 1 GHz Processor (1.4 GHz recommended), 512MB RAM (1 GB recommended), 3D graphics card compatible with DirectX 7 (compatible with DirectX 9 recommended), Mouse, Keyboard.
